long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can automatically join a Google Meet with specified conditions such as "if more than a few people join" or "at a specified time".

This will prevent you from walking into a meeting and finding no one, being awkwardly left alone with two people, or being late because you are working on something else.

It'll make using Google Meet a whole lot more pleasant!
